name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, straw, ezcmac, UntilYouAreSoNude, Zefiel, riotdejaneiro, Overmedicated, bearattack, sevenarts, fuckcabbage, GeyserShitdick, pants, bug, trisha, regrepnsnefpoh, antecen, fancypants, DougTheHead, atticusonline, Baryonyx, Axhoola, lk, aHatOfPig, Ihmgard, Fcannon, kenyot, eRiUukFJk, greyfield, stormagnet, ouroboros, tragicone, Darthemed, afvbs, flynn)

name: catachresis
text: You are strating to make sense instead of trouble

name: twohundredninety
text: Yeah, I really don't think Philippe is supposed to be retarded anymore. He seems rather precocious, in fact.

name: overmedicated
text: How long does it take an otter to fully mature anyway? Not long, I'd imagine.

name: wite_rabit
text: They can start... boning at 4, but that doesn't necessarily mean they're mature .

name: tbtabby
text: The proper term is "savant."

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, Mangtastic, getawaykettle, zpa, HSE, fancypants, Doc_Rostov, I_Love_Kate)

name: shinkusan
text: what don't you understand?? PHILIPPE IS FIVE!

name: isaach
text: great mexico drawing, phillipe

name: chasanator
text: mexico fist bump. relations improve.

name: sleaw
text: bunp

name: pants
text: because everyone knows mexico's king is an otter...and a king.

name: relaxing
text: Vincente... Fox ?

name: zefiel
text: Awesome. I miss him and wish we could re-elect. XD Then again, I'm THAT retarded. (but Philippe isn't, he's just five, damnit.)

name: lizjones
text: Philippe knows cursive, but Lyle doesn't.

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by BoscoStacy, killerlimpet, tellumo)

name: cryabetes
text:
whoa i forgot lyle did calligraphy

kudos on the recollection

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Lyle knows cusses.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i can cuss a swear myself! *a-hem!*

'diaper biscuits!'

name: hyetal
text: Why don't you just go home and get teen pregnant?

name: epicurus
text: Those notes are good.

name: epicurus
text:
What the fuck?

I go back through these seeing what my initial thoughts were and this crap is the best I could come up with? I sound like the mentally handicapped robot who built this keyboard.

The comment is netiehr funny, nor insightful, nor does it even relay anything about me as a person, and I condemn it to HADES.

name: zem
text:
at least it wasn't just a line from the comic
i made a few of those back in the day

name: epicurus
text: Man what an idiot you were to do that. I've never posted anything about me saying or otherwise using lines from the strip, that's for sure.

name: yomimono
text: At least neither of you are involved in one of the constant fucking arguments about Asherdan at this point.  Christ, that shit is annoying.  I wish there was a way to tag comments as "boring meta bullshit" and then avoid them forever.

name: apocowarg
text: I really do regret the thread where I got involved in that debate. My only defense is I wrote it a long time ago after reading a bajillion "Why does everyone lame this guy?" comments. That's not a very good defense for the shitty essay I wrote about why asherdan sucks and I wish there was some way to delete it.

name: farqussus
text: Well at least you didn't abuse people for posting the alt-texts of strips because you didn't realise other people couldn't see them.

name: scifigrl47
text: Dude, going through the archives, your rage at the alt texts and your later repentance has been one of the highlights.  So much rage, and so many polite apologies extended.  By the end, I expected you to be showing up with a frickin' Edible Arrangment labeled "Sorry about the inaccurate laming!"  Pineapple carved into little Rays, dipped in chocoate...

name: farqussus
text: Everyone I abused and everyone adversely effected by my tomfoolery got a DVD featuring me enduring five minutes of personalised abuse from Don Rickles and a kick in the balls from the only girl I'll ever truly love, and a crystal orb containing one tear that was actually shed during the tirade.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Was it supposed to be a reference to the Chris Isaak strip , or something?

name: ssddr
text: I have always wondered if the last pannel is supposed to be a handshake or some type of otter respect knuckles thing.

name: liquidcruelty
text: When I saw it, the first thing that entered my mind was RESPECK KNUCKLES, so you may be onto something.

name: dumase
text: i thought what they were doing, wasnt shaking hands but sort of joining them at the palms. as if all their conflicts could be solved by intimate hand contact.

name: phthoggos
text: Touching flipper-tips and smiling is perhaps the most basic of otter greetings.

name: erinye
text:
Oh, good, I wasn't the only one.

Totally a knuckle-bump.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: * dap

name: greenkoolayd
text:
paws of a cape clawless otter:
[IMGS OFF]

name: greenkoolayd
text: FML

name: centipede_damascus
text: Philipe thinks all Mexicans have large moustaches.

name: aparrish
text: And sashes.

name: cdl146
text: After all, most train related deaths could have been prevented.

name: cailetshadow
text: yeah its not like you can dodge the wrong way when you see a train coming.

name: dans
text: But you gotta be careful they don't get the jump on you.

name: tekende
text: The trick, see, is to run to the side. Don't try to run straight away from the train, don't let the train chase you. Run perpendicular to the train.

name: greyfield
text: Someone needs to get Philippe a copy of Anna Karenina.

name: darthemed
text: Teodor leaves after reading the first note.

name: dumase
text: this actually makes the comic ten times funnier.

name: gigs
text: It took me till the third or fourth time through to notice that. Truly the best part of rereading strips.

name: pepperhittherim
text: Phillipe is giving Mexico some dap.

name: liquidcruelty
text: "A person who has a truck should not honk a bunch" sounds almost Confucian for some reason.

name: tbtabby
text: In that one panel, Phillippe has shown a more mature handling of foreign relations than the current administration has over the past seven years.

name: yomimono
text: At the time I think Bush was making much of his many meetings with Mexico.

name: skoora
text: Of course the Mexican president has a mustache.

name: epicurus
text: You know, I think that first one is actually a vote-getter. Also I love that he assumes the President of Mexico is an Otter as well (and apparently extremely short)

name: drago25
text: The idea of the President of Mexico as an otter with a mustache tickles me

name: wallabeechamp
text: He still would have been better than Bush.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Phillipe in 2016.
